name: Alex the Bird's School!
description:
Alex the Bird's School is a state-of-the-art fully interactive, fun-time educational game that teaches a slew of subjects! From Math to Spelling You will learn alot!  Meet Alex's Friends! DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS GAME! It's not What it seems like Once you Anger alex, There's no turning back, and if he find you... Look just Trust me Okay? if you end up playing this Avoid alex at ALL COSTS. Use the Items scattered around to Escape!

To your Heart's content While you look For all the Notebooks! this game dosen't just teach Education, it also teaches FUN!

WARNING!

This game Contains Loud Jumpscares...

Fact: We were too lazy to program the items

Can I mod This?

Yes you Can But make sure to Put us in the credits

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

E - Pick up Notebooks

Esc - Quit to Menu

New!

Open Source Avalible! you Need Unity to Use it!

Tools Used:

  • Unity
  • Visual Studio Code
  • Paint.NET
  • Anim8or
